    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_border_guard = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_maniacal_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_maniacal = yes
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			leader_class = scientist
			has_leader_flag = renowned_materialist1
		}

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_paranoid_2 }
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_carrier_specialization_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_carrier_specialization = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    
    owner = {
        
		OR = {
			has_technology = tech_cruisers
			has_technology = tech_harbingers
		}
		has_technology = tech_strike_craft_1
    }
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_space_miner = {
    has_governor_subclass = yes
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_robotist = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			OR = {
				has_technology = tech_robotic_workers
				has_cybernetic_ascension = yes
				is_individual_machine = yes
			}
		}

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_feedback_loop = {
    is_gestalt = yes

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		exists = owner
		owner = { country_uses_food = yes }
		is_pool_leader = yes # Starting trait only.

    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_artillery_specialization = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_any_admiral_speciality = no
		has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    
    owner = {
        
		OR = {
			has_technology = tech_destroyers
			has_technology = tech_stingers
		}
    }
}

}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_shroud_preacher = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		from = {
			NOT = {
				has_origin = origin_mindwardens
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = mindwarden_commander
		}
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
		}

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

		trait_is_gestalt_check = no
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			allows_slavery = yes
		}

    leader_class = commander
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_capitalist_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_capitalist = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_venerated = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_demolisher_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_demolisher = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor
		}

    leader_class = commander

		has_trait = subclass_commander_general

    leader_class = commander

}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_environmental_engineer = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			has_blocker_removal_tech = yes
		}

    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_entrepreneur = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			country_uses_consumer_goods = yes
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_homesteader_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_homesteader = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_martinet = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_lawless }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_lawless_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_homesteader = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			country_uses_food = yes
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_juryrigger = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_wrecker }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_wrecker_2 }
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_commanding_presence_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_commanding_presence = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_scrapper_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_scrapper = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_crew_trainer_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_crew_trainer = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_mining_focus_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_mining_focus = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_capitalist = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_heavy_hitter_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_heavy_hitter = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_farming_focus = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		exists = owner
		owner = { country_uses_food = yes }
		has_any_governor_focus = no
		has_governor_subclass = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_master_gunner = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_venerated_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_venerated = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_martinet_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_martinet = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_lawless }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_lawless_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_space_miner_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_space_miner = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_academia_recruiter = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
		has_ethic = ethic_materialist

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer = {
    leader_class = commander
    exists = owner
    owner = { has_origin = origin_treasure_hunters }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_trophy_hunter = {
    has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_adventurous_spirit = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_reinforcer_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_reinforcer = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_border_guard = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_council_subclass = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_battleship_focus = {
    has_paragon_dlc = no

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_corvette_focus }
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_cruiser_focus }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_corvette_focus = {
    has_paragon_dlc = no

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_cruiser_focus }
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_battleship_focus }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_shipbreaker_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_shipbreaker = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_educator = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_council_subclass = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_righteous = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_corrupt }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_corrupt_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_generator_focus = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_any_governor_focus = no
		has_governor_subclass = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_general

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_governor_subclass = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_fleet_organizer = yes
    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_nervous }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_nervous_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_hardy = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_trait = subclass_commander_general
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_slothful }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_slothful_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_politician = {
    OR = {
			is_gestalt = no
			AND = {
				is_gestalt = yes
				is_councilor = yes
			}
		}

    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_crusader_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_crusader = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_rocketry_specialization = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_any_admiral_speciality = no
		has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    exists = owner
    owner = { has_technology = tech_missiles_1 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_carrier_specialization = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_any_admiral_speciality = no
		has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    
    owner = {
        
		OR = {
			has_technology = tech_cruisers
			has_technology = tech_harbingers
		}
		has_technology = tech_strike_craft_1
    }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_surgical_bombardment_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_surgical_bombardment = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_void_hunter = {
    has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			has_encountered_any_fauna = yes
		}

    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_military_pioneer_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_military_pioneer = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_scout = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_explorer
		}

    leader_class = commander
}

    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_governor

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_general

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_wrecker = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_juryrigger }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_juryrigger_2 }
}

		has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

		has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_corrupt }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_corrupt_2 }

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical_2 }

    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_rocketry_specialization = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    exists = owner
    owner = { has_technology = tech_missiles_1 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_imperial_heir = {
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_trickster = {
    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_unyielding }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_reckless }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_reckless_2 }
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_general

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_fortifier_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_fortifier = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people = {
    is_gestalt = no

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_armada_logistician = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor
		}

    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_skirmisher = {
    leader_class = commander
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_eye_for_talent = yes
    leader_class = commander

    leader_class = commander

			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor
		}

    leader_class = commander
}

		has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_wrecker }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_wrecker_2 }

			has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor
		}

    leader_class = commander

    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_generator_focus_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_generator_focus = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_archaeo_specialization = {
    has_ancrel = yes
		OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			has_ascension_perk = ap_archaeoengineers
		}

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_observant_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_observant = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_conscripter = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_governor

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_pirate_queen = {
    has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_butcher = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armchair_commander }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armchair_commander_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_restrained }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_unyielding = {
    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_nervous }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_nervous_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_slipshod }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_slipshod_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_trickster }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_recruiter = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor
		}

    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_mediator = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_governor_subclass = yes
		has_ethic = ethic_xenophile

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_demolisher = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_general

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_home_guard = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_gunship_specialization_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_gunship_specialization = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_mining_focus = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_any_governor_focus = no
		has_governor_subclass = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_from_the_ranks_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_from_the_ranks = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_crusader = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_general

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_cruiser_focus = {
    has_paragon_dlc = no

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_corvette_focus }
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
    NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_battleship_focus }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_cautious = {
    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_aggressive }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer = yes
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_engineer = {
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_conscripter_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_conscripter = yes
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_military_overseer = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_energy_weapon_specialist = {
    has_astral_planes_dlc = yes

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_maven_of_war = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 8
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_gale_speed = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor
			exists = event_target:officer
		}

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_lethargic }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_lethargic_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_private_mines = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_crew_trainer = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding = {
    leader_class = commander
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_scrapper = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_aggressive = {
    leader_class = commander
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cautious }
}
